dcterms:description: The CrowdAI dataset contains 280741 images for training and 60317 images for testing. The size of each image is 300×300 pixels and the annotations are in MS-COCO format.
dcterms:title: CrowdAI dataset

dcterms:creator: E. Maggiori
Y. Tarabalka
G. Charpiat
P. Alliez
dcterms:description: The Inria dataset consists of 360 aerial images of 5000×5000 pixels from 10 different cities, featuring a large proportion of buildings with internal holes and multiple polygons per building.
dcterms:title: Inria dataset
